feed.title: Dave and Ellie Wedding
feed.subtitle: wedding in Kingston near Lewes on 18th of August 2018

entry.title: Transportation
entry.content:
Georgetown is 23 miles north of downtown Austin. Driving on I-35, head north for about 30 minutes and the venue is a short distance from the highway exit. We are happy to facilitate carpools, and will be renting a shuttle on the day of the wedding for those who are interested. We’ll have a sign-up available for the shuttle as the date approaches.

Update: Uber and Lyft will return to Austin

We’d like to hear from you about your transportation needs in order to make the event safe and fun for everyone!

We are happy to facilitate carpools, and will be renting a shuttle on the day of the wedding for those who are interested. We’ll have a sign-up available for the shuttle as the date approaches. entry.title: Accommodations
entry.content:
Although the ceremony and reception are in Georgetown, we recommend you stay in Austin to explore the “live music capital of the world”. There are also great outdoor running trails and great food.

AirBnB

Hotels in Austin are expensive. AirBnB is a great way to stay in a cool Austin neighborhood and save some money! We’ve started an AirBnB wishlist to get you started on your search:
Austin AirBnB suggestions

If you’re new to AirBnB, you can sign up.

Hotels

We’ve reserved two hotel blocks for our guests. Both hotels are conveniently located in or near downtown Austin.

Radisson Hotel & Suites Austin Downtown

111 E Cesar Chavez St, Austin, TX 78701
https://aws.passkey.com/go/ContilloGullySantiagoBlock
King Room $235 per night
Suite $275 per night
Parking $20 per night

Extended Stay America Austin

507 South First Street Austin, TX 78704
Contact Group Sales 1-877-701-3383
Mention Contillo & Gully-Santiago Wedding
Single Queen Room $129 per night
Double Queen Room $149 per night

Here are some other excellent hotel options that don’t have a group rate:

South Congress

  • Austin Motel $$
  • Hotel San Jose $$$

Downtown

  • The Driskill $$$

UTexas Campus

  • Austin Folk House $

There are also great outdoor running trails and great food. AirBnB Hotels in Austin are expensive. AirBnB is a great way to stay in a cool Austin neighborhood and save some money! We’ve started an AirBnB wishlist to get you started on your search: Austin AirBnB suggestions If you’re new to AirBnB, you can sign up. Hotels We’ve reserved two hotel blocks for our guests. Both hotels are conveniently located in or near downtown Austin. entry.title: Location and schedule
entry.content:
Friday, October 27, 2017

(Afternoon rehearsal meetup for wedding party members)

Unofficial gathering, all welcome:

  • 5:00 pm Happy hour at The ABGB, Austin, Texas

Saturday, October 28, 2017

The ceremony and reception are at the same venue:

Pearl Snap Hall, Georgetown, Texas

  • 5:00 pm Ceremony
  • 5:30 pm Cocktail hour and apps
  • 7:00 pm Dinner
  • 8:00 pm Music and dancing
  • 10:00 pm Doors close

Afterparty, Location TBD

  • 10:30 pm afterparty in Downtown Austin

Sunday, October 29, 2017

Unofficial Brunch, Veracruz All Natural at Radio Coffee

  • ~10:30 am - noon
